extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Confluence Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Confluence Server or Data Center version is affected by checking the installed version against the fixed versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Confluence Version
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest version of Confluence Server or Data Center to address the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan for Indicators of Compromise (IOCs)
extracted_playbook.description: Scan Confluence servers for IOCs published by Volexity researchers and any other suspicious behavior.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is it possible to upgrade Confluence?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Atlassian Workarounds
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the recommended workarounds for Confluence versions 7.15.0 to 7.18.0 and 7.0.0 to 7.14.2 if upgrading is not possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Other Security Flaws
extracted_playbook.description: Be aware that the mitigation does not cover other security flaws fixed in the update. Continue monitoring for any additional vulnerabilities.
